price: Hanga guyyaa murtiitti abaarsi kiyya sirra haa jiraatu.”
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ لَعۡنَتِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka laʿnatī ilā yawmi al-dīni
